data.name: ReadCaseAssignmentOffice
data.value: select T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.CAS_NO, T2.OFFICE_ID, T2.COG_TYPE_CODE, T2.COG_CODE, T2.OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_ASSIGN_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) on T1.CAS_NO = @casNo and T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate and T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate and T2.OFFICE_ID = T1.OFF_ID order by T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCaseCaseRoleCaseRoleCaseAssignment1
data.value: select * from ( select T2.CAS_NUMBER CAS_NUMBER1, T2.CSP_NUMBER CSP_NUMBER1, T2.TYPE TYPE1, T2.CASE_ROLE_ID CASE_ROLE_ID1, T2.START_DATE START_DATE1, T2.END_DATE END_DATE1, T3.CAS_NUMBER CAS_NUMBER2, T3.CSP_NUMBER CSP_NUMBER2, T3.TYPE TYPE2, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID CASE_ROLE_ID2, T3.START_DATE START_DATE2, T3.END_DATE END_DATE2 from CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on T2.TYPE = 'AP' and T2.START_DATE <= @startDate and T2.END_DATE >= @startDate and @cspNumber1 = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NUMBER and (T3.TYPE in ('CH', 'AR')) and T3.START_DATE <= @startDate and T3.END_DATE >= @startDate and @cspNumber2 = T3.CSP_NUMBER ) S1 cross apply ( select top(1) EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE with(readuncommitted) where S1.CAS_NUMBER1 = CAS_NO and EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate and DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate ) S2

data.name: ReadCaseCaseRoleCaseRoleCaseAssignment2
data.value: select * from ( select T2.CAS_NUMBER CAS_NUMBER1, T2.CSP_NUMBER CSP_NUMBER1, T2.TYPE TYPE1, T2.CASE_ROLE_ID CASE_ROLE_ID1, T2.START_DATE START_DATE1, T2.END_DATE END_DATE1, T3.CAS_NUMBER CAS_NUMBER2, T3.CSP_NUMBER CSP_NUMBER2, T3.TYPE TYPE2, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID CASE_ROLE_ID2, T3.START_DATE START_DATE2, T3.END_DATE END_DATE2 from CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on T2.TYPE = 'AP' and T2.END_DATE > @endDate and @cspNumber1 = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NUMBER and (T3.TYPE in ('CH', 'AR')) and T3.END_DATE > @endDate and @cspNumber2 = T3.CSP_NUMBER and ( T2.START_DATE > @endDate or T3.START_DATE > @endDate ) and T2.START_DATE <= T3.END_DATE and T2.END_DATE >= T3.START_DATE ) S1 cross apply ( select top(1) EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE with(readuncommitted) where S1.CAS_NUMBER1 = CAS_NO and EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate and DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate ) S2

data.name: ReadCaseCaseRoleCaseRoleCaseAssignment3
data.value: select * from ( select T2.CAS_NUMBER CAS_NUMBER1, T2.CSP_NUMBER CSP_NUMBER1, T2.TYPE TYPE1, T2.CASE_ROLE_ID CASE_ROLE_ID1, T2.START_DATE START_DATE1, T2.END_DATE END_DATE1, T3.CAS_NUMBER CAS_NUMBER2, T3.CSP_NUMBER CSP_NUMBER2, T3.TYPE TYPE2, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID CASE_ROLE_ID2, T3.START_DATE START_DATE2, T3.END_DATE END_DATE2 from CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on T2.TYPE = 'AP' and T2.START_DATE < @startDate and @cspNumber1 = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NUMBER and (T3.TYPE in ('CH', 'AR')) and T3.START_DATE < @startDate and @cspNumber2 = T3.CSP_NUMBER and ( T2.END_DATE < @startDate or T3.END_DATE < @startDate ) and T2.START_DATE <= T3.END_DATE and T2.END_DATE >= T3.START_DATE ) S1 cross apply ( select top(1) EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE with(readuncommitted) where S1.CAS_NUMBER1 = CAS_NO and EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate and DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate ) S2

data.name: ReadCseOrganization
data.value: select T1.ORGANZTN_ID, T1.TYPE_CODE from CKT_CSE_ORGANIZATN T1 with(readuncommitted) where T1.TYPE_CODE = 'J' and exists ( select * from CKT_CSE_ORG_RELATN T2 with(readuncommitted) where T1.TYPE_CODE = T2.COG_CHILD_TYPE and T1.ORGANZTN_ID = T2.COG_CHILD_CODE and T2.REASON_CODE = 'JC' and T2.COG_PARENT_TYPE = @cogParentType and T2.COG_PARENT_CODE = @cogParentCode )

data.name: ReadCsePerson1
data.value: select NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON with(readuncommitted) where NUMB = @numb and cast(@cpaType as char(1)) = 'R'

data.name: ReadCsePerson2
data.value: select NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON with(readuncommitted) where NUMB = @numb and cast(@cpaSupType as char(1)) = 'S'

data.name: ReadCsePerson3
data.value: select NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON with(readuncommitted) where NUMB = @numb and cast(@cpaSupType as char(1)) = 'S'

data.name: ReadDebtDetail1
ReadDebtDetail2
ReadFips
data.value: select [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION from CKT_FIPS where LOCATION = @location and COUNTY = @county and [STATE] = @state

data.name: ReadLegalActionTribunalFips
data.value: select * from ( select T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.STANDARD_NO, T1.TRB_ID, T2.FIP_LOCATION, T2.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T2.FIP_COUNTY, T2.FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 with(readuncommitted) on T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId and T2.IDENTIFIER = T1.TRB_ID ) S1 outer apply ( select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION from CKT_FIPS where LOCATION = S1.FIP_LOCATION and COUNTY = S1.FIP_COUNTY and [STATE] = S1.FIP_STATE ) S2

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, LGA_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION with(readuncommitted) where DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId and OB_ID = @obId and CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber and CPA_TYPE = @cpaType

data.name: ReadObligationDebt
data.value: select T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T2.OB_TRN_ID, T2.OB_TRN_TYP, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OB_TRN T2 with(readuncommitted) on T2.OTY_TYPE = @otyType and T2.OB_TRN_TYP = @obTrnTyp and T2.OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId and T2.CPA_TYPE = @cpaType and T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber and T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId and T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTY_TYPE and T1.OB_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID and T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE and T2.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE'

data.name: ReadObligationType1
data.value: select DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId

data.name: ReadObligationType2
data.value: select DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE with(readuncommitted) where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId

data.name: ReadTribunal
data.value: select FIP_LOCATION, JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, IDENTIFIER, FIP_COUNTY, FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL where IDENTIFIER = @identifier
